TopRight Property

CDXML Name:TopRight
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_TopRight
CDX Constant Value:0x020A
Data Size:CDXPoint2D
Property of objects:kCDXObj_TLCPlate
First written/read in:ChemDraw 8.0
Required?No

Description:

The location of the top-right corner of a quadrilateral object, possibly in a rotated or skewed frame.

If this property is absent:

The top-right is positioned at (0, 0).
